comments.body:
if we're adding support for URIs, also update describer:

https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/7b6369c803cd06f0084ac57b2b6266000b739aea/staging/src/k8s.io/kubectl/pkg/describe/versioned/describe.go#L3264-L3273

and kubelet client cert recognizers to require URI SANs to be empty:

https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/7b6369c803cd06f0084ac57b2b6266000b739aea/pkg/controller/certificates/approver/sarapprove.go#L176-L178

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +69,73 @@		IPAddresses:        cr.IPAddresses,
		EmailAddresses:     cr.EmailAddresses,
		URIs:               cr.URIs,
		PublicKeyAlgorithm: cr.PublicKeyAlgorithm,
		PublicKey:          cr.PublicKey,
